name: Sense (Christos Kalanidis)
description:
Story

Sense is a game that takes place in a post apocalyptic future, where the player follows a robot in its journy to find its maker. While along the way it learns new emotions that change how the robot interacts with the world.

Information

This game was made in the University of Skövde as our first year game project!

Sense will not continue unfortunately!

Controls

Keyboard

E/X = Grab/Throw And Use

Space/X = Jump

A/D/Left/Right arrow = Move horizontally

Escape = Back to menu

Xbox controller

A = Jump

Left/Right stick = Move horizontally

X = Grab/Throw And Use

B = Back to menu
